summary:
Robb: Arya, in your professional opinion, how would I die?
Arya: Murder. Gangland style execution. We never find your head....
body:
Robb: Arya, in your professional opinion, how would I die?

Arya: Murder. Gangland style execution. We never find your head.

Sansa: That’s a shame

Rickon: *silently rises finger*

Arya: you slip in a tub.

summary: Unpopular opinion.  I think Jon/Dany/tyrion are all bad rulers and I'm ok with their deaths.  I will be disappointed if we don't...
question: Unpopular opinion.  I think Jon/Dany/tyrion are all bad rulers and I'm ok with their deaths.  I will be disappointed if we don't have Sansa/arya/bran working together to fight the threats against Westeros and the rebuilding efforts afterwards.
answer:
You’re speaking my language anon. Tyrion is obviously the most talent of the three but he also blew up parts of King’s Landing and wondered why the smallfolk hated him afterwards. 

I personally think Jon x Dany x Tyrion are the most expendable characters who have something to do with the Others/White Walkers. GRRM can’t imagine them in a post apocalyptic world like he can Sansa, Arya and Bran so he has no problem killing them.

reblog.comment:

summary: If Sansa is ugly, do you think she will be hated and attacked as much as she is right now? Like when people will think and/or...
question: If Sansa is ugly, do you think she will be hated and attacked as much as she is right now? Like when people will think and/or accuse good looking people as stupid, bimbo, bitch, jerk, whore, gay,etc.
answer:
Honestly on one hand I don’t think she would be, just for the simple reason that If Sansa wasn’t attractive some folks in this fandom wouldn’t be able to project all of their inferiority complexes on her and see her as such a threat. *looking at you arya stans*


On the other hand even if Sansa was ugly, she would still be hated because for a ton of people, it’s not Sansa’s beauty that makes her so abhorrent, it’s her femininity and how she uses it.

Just look at how differently people responded to Margery as a character. She was an attractive woman from a prominent family who was hungry for power and people loved her and yet hate Sansa for the same reasons (despite Sansa not have the thirst for power that Margery had). Why would people hate Sansa but love Margery? Because Margery used her femininity as a weapon to barter for a place at the male dominated table. This meant that Margery could be a safe conduit for all of their fantasies, this meant that Margery played a role in the game that folks are comfortable seeing women play. Who doesn’t love a female character using her feminine allure to gain the validation of men! We’ve seen this play out countless times before.


But here you have Sansa. Who isn’t really seen as sexual being on the show and among the worst type of fans. Her femininity hasn’t been a weapon it’s been a shield which infuriates a lot of people who hate women. How dare she not use her womanhood to negotiate a place at the table! What else does she think it’s good for!? People can’t comprehend how characters and fans see any value in Sansa Stark outside of her name and her ability to pussy pop for a queenship. Sansa is a Bitch because she refuses to open herself for the male gaze, she refuses to beg for validation, she refuses to drop her armor as a lady to conform to their idea of what a “badass” female should be which is usually a walking talking cliche of masculinity, a sex object, or a corrupted soul on a rampage.


Sansa is none of these things. She’s been fragile, vulnerable, afraid, at the mercy of others, and naive….she’s also been kind, dignified, conservative, stubborn, and caring. She has changed over time and yet she has also remained uncorrpted in ways that people can’t wrap their heads around. How dare she not respond to her abuse by becoming a merciless bitch, how dare she not respond to period of powerlessness by being a power hungry mad woman, how dare she not respond to frustrations with having her body sold away to different men by becoming a skilled seductress. How dare she make a name for herself based off her identity as a woman of a north and based off her kindness and intelligence as a leader instead of based off that man she can seduce or what special power she can hold. How dare she not succumb to all the grand plans all the men in her left had for her and instead go steadfast after what she wants instead.

So even if Sansa was ugly, she still wouldn’t fit what a lot of people think is appealing and acceptable in female characters. So in a lot of ways she would still be hated.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary:
Brienne x Sansa 
For @sansasnowstark 
Sansa Stark always wanted a knight like the ones in her favorite songs. With an armour...
body:
Brienne x Sansa

For @sansasnowstark


Sansa Stark always wanted a knight like the ones in her favorite songs. With an armour that shinned like the moon and locks like the sun.

Brienne of Tarth wanted to serve a higher cause. To strike in the name of honor and kneel before royalty.

Both of them got what they wanted but didn’t realize that they would get something much richer than any throne and something much more deadlier than any sword.

tags: i know this said hockey but it lacks a lil
honestly its hard to describe high school hockey if you haven't been
AND ALL YOU GUYS BETTER CLICK THAT LINK
summary:
Chapter 15 | All Hockey Hair Team
        |
        Minnesota, State Of...
title:
Chapter 15 | All Hockey Hair Team
        |
        Minnesota, State Of...
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“You made it!” her little brother cried in delight when she stepped out from behind Sandor and opened her arms. “And Sandor too!” Rickon dropped his hockey bag, as large as he was, on the floor with a loud thump, and bypassed Sansa’s waiting hug, going straight to Sandor.

“Just the loving big sister, that’s all,” Sansa remarked to herself, before turning to her boys. Rickon was already eagerly demanding to hear how Sandor thought he’d done.

“Maybe say hi to your sister first, she missed you,” Sandor ordered, and Rickon turned, scooped Sansa up into a hug, paused to kiss her cheek briefly, and yelled,

“Thanks-for-coming-you’re-the-best-sister-ever-i-love-you-thank-you-!” then he was right back to asking Sandor if he’d seen his sick slap shot, and he was trying to go five hole, but his new stick has more flex, and he really should have practiced, so—

“Alright, enough,” Sansa cut him off with a laugh eventually. “Sandor and I need to go home, and you have school tomorrow. Who’s driving you home?”

“Danny’s mom,” Rickon said, craning his neck around. “They’re over there, saying bye to his grandma.”

“Then we won’t keep them waiting, it’s rude,” Sansa reminded him, kissing his head. “Go on, you’ll have plenty of time to harass Sandor about hockey at Thanksgiving.”

tags: I would die for Sansa tbh
summary: Me: Yeah, I have a lot of faves in Game of Thrones but I understand if people don’t like them. You know, it’s all about personal...
body:
Me: Yeah, I have a lot of faves in Game of Thrones but I understand if people don’t like them. You know, it’s all about personal preference. I’m not big on some faves in the fandom and that’s okay.

Someone: Sansa is annoying and selfish.

Me: *kill bill sirens* You come into MY house–
